qas.question: The use of the first ass instruments occurred in what era?
What became widespread in the Renaissance era?
Musical forms for dance began to standardize during what era?

context: The <a1_0><a2_0><a4_0>Renaissance<a4_0/><a2_0/><a1_0/> era was <a0_0>from 1400 to 1600<a0_0/>. It was characterized by greater use of instrumentation, multiple interweaving melodic lines, and the use of the first bass instruments. <a3_0>Social dancing<a3_0/> became more widespread, so musical forms appropriate to accompanying dance began to standardize.
